statements: UPDATE GenomicsStudies SET researcher_name='John Doe', study_name='Study A' WHERE study_id=1;
UPDATE GenomicsStudies SET sequencing_technology='NGS', organism='Human' WHERE study_id=2;
UPDATE GenomicsStudies SET sequencing_technology = 'Illumina HiSeq' WHERE study_id = 1;
UPDATE GenomicsStudies SET researcher_name = 'Dr. Smith', organism = 'Human' WHERE study_id = 2;
UPDATE genomics_study SET sample_name = 'Sample1' WHERE sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE proteomics_study SET proteomic_data = '{"data": [1, 2, 3]}' WHERE sample_name = 'Sample2';
UPDATE genomics_study SET sample_name = 'Sample A', genomic_data = '{"mutation": true, "gene": "IGF1"}' WHERE sample_id = 'edf607bf-c74e-42b9-af5c-eb5588d1b69d';
UPDATE proteomics_study SET proteomic_data = '{"protein": "AKT1", "expression": 0.85}', sample_name = 'Sample B' WHERE sample_id = 'fea27717-a452-4a23-9a03-b9c1aec71e5e';
UPDATE genomics_data SET mutation_count = 10 WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE metabolomics_data SET metabolite_concentration = 5.8, metabolite_name = 'Glucose' WHERE sample_id = 2;
UPDATE genomics_data SET dna_sequence = 'ATGGCTAGCTGAATA', mutation_count = 5 WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE proteomics_data SET protein_sequence = 'MQKRSLLAAAGLALLTAAA' WHERE sample_id = 2;
UPDATE Genomics SET gene_expression = 7.25 WHERE sample_id = 101;
UPDATE Proteomics SET protein_abundance = 10.5, protein_id = 'P1234' WHERE sample_id = 204;
UPDATE Genomics SET gene_expression = 10.5 WHERE sample_id = 1;
UPDATE Proteomics SET protein_abundance = 25.3 WHERE sample_id = 10;
UPDATE genomics_data SET data = 'New updated data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sample_metadata SET study_description = 'Updated study description' WHERE sample_id = 100;
UPDATE genomics_data SET variant_type='SNP', genomic_position=1020 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE proteomics_data SET expression_level=1.5, sample_id=3 WHERE protein_name='ProteinA';
